VL Log Fields¶

class vlogfield.Datetime(datetime_token)¶

Represents both date and time field.

__init__(datetime_token)¶

Initialize datetime field from str token.

Parameters:datetime_token (str) – Date and time token from VL log field
Raises:ValueError – On value that doesn’t follow date and time format
__str__()¶

Convert date and time fields to str following vl formatting.

get_datetime()¶

Return the datetime object of the field.

classmethod get_pattern()¶

Return the regex str used for identifying VL datetime field.

class vlogfield.Type(type)¶

Represents the type field.

__init__(type)¶

Initialize datetime field from VLogType token.

Parameters:type (VLogType) – Type of log
Raises:ValueError – On types not in VLogType
__str__()¶

Convert type field to str.

get_type()¶

Return the VLogType of the field.

classmethod get_pattern()¶

Return the regex str used for identifying VL type field.

class vlogfield.Source(source_token)¶

Represents the source field.

__init__(source_token)¶

Initialize source field from str token.

Parameters:source_token (str) – Source token from VL log
Raises:ValueError – On value that doesn’t follow source format
__str__()¶

Convert source field to str.

get_module()¶

Return the str module of the field.

get_line_number()¶

Return the int line number of the field.

classmethod get_pattern()¶

Return the regex str used for identifying VL source field.

class vlogfield.Thread(thread_token)¶

Represents the thread field.

Variables:thread_token (str) – Thread token from VL log
__init__(thread_token)¶

Initialize thread field from str token.

Parameters:thread_token (str) – Thread token from VL log
Raises:ValueError – On value that doesn’t follow thread format
__str__()¶

Convert thread field to str.

get_process()¶

Return the str process of the field.

get_thread()¶

Return the str thread of the field.

classmethod get_pattern()¶

Return the regex str used for identifying VL thread field.

class vlogfield.Details(details_token)¶

Represents the details field.

Variables:details_token (str) – Details token from VL log
__init__(details_token)¶

Initialize thread field from str token.

__str__()¶

Convert details field to str.
